title: Portfolio App
info: A end result of my 18 months of learning of Kotlin & Android Jetpack. It wasn't easy ;-)
text: This is a personal portfolio app where I want to show my skills and passion for Android design and development. I used the latest, up to date technologies such as Android Jetpack components, Kotlin Coroutines, and many best practices. The code is available on Github, and it may help others to learn the latest Android components to build the first Android Kotlin app.

title: Ponda App
info: The app is called after "Giant Panda" known as a panda bear to awake awareness of the people for distinction of the animals.
text: Helps people to read key ideas of best-selling books for personal development. The app provides the content in text and audio formats, and it supports accessibility for the visually impaired and blind community.

title: Resume App
info: This project was developed during my Android development study.
text: Personal Resume is an open-source and native Android applicaton which is mobile version of my previous personal portfolio, and it was written in Java, and has Model-View-Control design architecture.

title: Ecommerce
info: Due to the minimum SDK requirements from Google, this app is not available on the Google Play store for download. However, you can watch the promotion video on Youtube.
text: The app synchronizes with the multiple online platforms and allowing viewing and creation of items for sale on the go. This is one of my first Android apps and it's based on Ushashide open-source platform. Almost, 90% of the code is adopted from Ushahidi android app.

title: Tshirt app
info: Due to the minimum SDK requirements from Google, this app is not available on the Google Play store for download. However, you can watch the promotion video on Youtube.
text: This is an fully offline portfolio app for Tshirt's designs. It's my first Android app which was developed during my study of Android development.

title: Online Resume
text: This is my previous portfolio page, which is fully responsive and, it was developed with PHP and MySQL.

title: VCard
text: This my virutal business card, and I always wanted to do my own clean and minimal vcard concept which should be different than others.

title: Project Website
info: Voluntarily designed and developed a website from scratch
text: When I worked as a team lead for the renewable energy project, I voluntarily designed and developed an official project's website from scratch.
